name: CreateMailchimpLandingPage
description:
Create an unpublished Mailchimp landing page.

This tool is used to create a new, unpublished landing page in Mailchimp without any content. It should be called when there's a need to set up a basic landing page framework in Mailchimp.

parameters.name: use_account_default_list
parameters.description: Set to 'true' to use the account's default list instead of specifying a list_id for the landing page.

value_schema.description: Will create the Landing Page using the account's Default List instead of requiring a list_id.

parameters.name: landing_page_name
parameters.description: The name of the landing page to be created.

value_schema.description: The name of this landing page.

parameters.name: landing_page_title
parameters.description: The title that appears in the browser's title bar for the landing page.

value_schema.description: The title of this landing page seen in the browser's title bar.

parameters.name: landing_page_description
parameters.description: Provide a description for the Mailchimp landing page.

value_schema.description: The description of this landing page.

parameters.name: store_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the store linked to this landing page.

value_schema.description: The ID of the store associated with this landing page.

parameters.name: mailchimp_list_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Mailchimp list associated with the landing page.

value_schema.description: The list's ID associated with this landing page.

parameters.name: landing_page_template_type
parameters.description: Specifies the template type for the landing page. Options are 'signup' or 'product'.

value_schema.description: The type of template the landing page has.

parameters.name: landing_page_template_id
parameters.description: The integer ID representing the template of the Mailchimp landing page.

value_schema.description: The template_id of this landing page.

parameters.name: track_with_mailchimp
parameters.description: Set to true to use cookies for tracking unique visitors and calculating conversion rates.

value_schema.description: Use cookies to track unique visitors and calculate overall conversion rate. Learn more [here](https://mailchimp.com/help/use-track-mailchimp/).

parameters.name: enable_restricted_data_processing
parameters.description: Enable restricted data processing under CCPA for tracking. True ensures compliance with CCPA.

value_schema.description: Google offers restricted data processing in connection with the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA) to restrict how Google uses certain identifiers and other data processed in the provision of its services. You can learn more about Google's restricted data processing within Google Ads [here](https://privacy.google.com/businesses/rdp/).
